messages.title: Labour will give you the final say on Brexit
messages.content: Only Labour is proposing to give the people the final say on Brexit. Tory plans will mean either a bad deal or no deal, while the SNP would make things even worse by leaving the UK at the same time. Labour will give the people a clear choice: leave with the best deal available, or vote to Remain in the EU.

messages.title: Labour will oppose independence vote
messages.content: After four years bogged down in Brexit, the last thing we need is another break-up with our nearest neighbors, so Labour will oppose another independence referendum. Once Labour has sorted out Brexit, there will be no excuse for the SNP's proposed referendum, and they should take it off the table.

messages.title: Put workers at the heart of energy transition
messages.content: Labour will put energy workers at the heart of the energy transition we need. Aberdeen's experience and expertise in North Sea oil give us a key role in growing offshore renewables and carbon capture and storage, while at the same time Labour will work to develop low-carbon industries onshore.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will provide billions for council housing and our NHS.
Labour will bring in a real living wage of £10 an hour for all.
Labour will bring public transport into public ownership and keep fares down.
Labour will replace Universal Credit with a social security system that will work for us all.
Labour will protect public postal services by ending privatization.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a teacher by profession, I care deeply about creating opportunities for young people and leaving a better world for future generations. I was born and brought up in Kincorth, and taught for over twenty years in Torry. My own children have grown up in Aberdeen. I want what is best for them, and for all the young people of our city and region. I have been active in my trade union, in my local community council, and in projects across the city. If elected, I will be equally active in representing everyone in Aberdeen South.

endorsements.endorsement: I know what it takes to represent this seat at Westminster, and I know Shona has what it takes. We need someone who will put local people first, and seek to heal the divisions of the last few years. I believe that Shona Simpson is the best person to do that job.

quotes.text: A Labour Government will bring the changes this country needs. With your support, I will work for better public services and an end to poverty pay, and for a fairer and more equal society.
